bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: Description of problem: This package is very old. It is from years 2012. There have been many upstream releases after that.
I don't have the time to maintain it. Are you volunteering?

Unfortunately I don't think I have skills nor time to maintain this. If there is no active maintainer for this, it probably needs to be dropped from repository? As this package has large potential for security problems, it is especially important it is maintained well.
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
davfs2-1.5.4-3.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-5e7abcde9d

davfs2-1.5.4-3.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-5e7abcde9d
davfs2-1.5.4-3.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

Can we also get an update for this package on Fedora 23? I am having an issue with davfs2 mounts showing invalid directory timestamps which does not occur when using version 1.5.4. I've also verified that the package builds properly by updating the version number in the spec file.

davfs2-1.5.4-3.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-441c3bf1fe
davfs2-1.5.4-3.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
